trans-unit.source: Ask questions about specific problems you have faced, including details about what exactly you are trying to do. Make sure you tag your question with react-bootstrap. You can also read through existing React-Bootstrap questions.
trans-unit.target: 询问有关您所面临的特定问题的问题，包括有关您到底想做什么的详细信息。确保使用 react-bootstrap 标记问题。您还可以阅读现有的React-Bootstrap问题。

trans-unit.source: <Card.Text> outputs <p> tags around the content, so you can use multiple <Card.Text>s to create separate paragraphs.
trans-unit.target: <Card.Text> 在内容周围输出 <p> 标记，因此您可以使用多个 <Card.Text> 来创建单独的段落。

trans-unit.source: <Nav> markup is very flexible and styling is controlled via classes so you can use whatever elements you like to build your navs. By default <Nav> and <Nav.Item> both render <div>s instead of <ul> and <li> elements respectively. This because it's possible (and common) to leave off the <Nav.Item>'s and render a <Nav.Link> directly, which would create invalid markup by default (ul > a).
trans-unit.target: <Nav> 标记非常灵活，样式是通过类控制的，因此您可以使用任何喜欢的元素来构建导航。默认情况下， <Nav> 和 <Nav.Item> 都呈现 <div> 而不是 <ul> 和 <li> 元素。这是因为可以（且通常）忽略 <Nav.Item> 并直接呈现 <Nav.Link> ，这将默认创建无效标记（ ul > a ）。

trans-unit.source: Note: Bootstrap only partially supports 'width'! You will need to supply your own CSS animation for the .width CSS class.

trans-unit.source: Note: For custom dropdown components, you will have to pass the rootCloseEvent to <RootCloseWrapper> in your custom dropdown menu component (similarly to how it is implemented in <Dropdown.Menu>).
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于自定义下拉菜单组件，您必须将 rootCloseEvent 传递给自定义下拉菜单组件中的 <RootCloseWrapper> （类似于在 <Dropdown.Menu> 中实现的方式）。

trans-unit.source: A Toast can also automatically hide after X milliseconds. For that, use the autohide prop in combination with delay the prop to sepecify the delay. But be aware, that it will only trigger the onClose function, you have to set manually the show property.
trans-unit.target: Toast也可以在X毫秒后自动隐藏。为此，将 autohide 道具与 delay 道具结合使用以区分延迟。但是请注意，它只会触发 onClose 函数，您必须手动设置show属性。

trans-unit.source: A callback fired when a NavItem is selected.
trans-unit.target: 当选择NavItem时触发的回调。

trans-unit.source: A callback fired when a descendant of a child <Nav> is selected. Should be used to execute complex closing or other miscellaneous actions desired after selecting a descendant of <Nav>. Does nothing if no <Nav> or <Nav> descendants exist. The callback is called with an eventKey, which is a prop from the selected <Nav> descendant, and an event.
trans-unit.target: 选择子级 <Nav> 的后代时触发的回调。在选择 <Nav> 的后代后，应用于执行复杂的关闭操作或执行其他所需的其他操作。如果不存在 <Nav> 或 <Nav> 后代，则不执行任何操作。使用一个eventKey和一个事件来调用该回调，该eventKey是来自所选 <Nav> 后代的道具。

trans-unit.source: As shown in the previous examples, our grid system allows you to place any number of <Col>s within a <Row> or <Form.Row>. They'll split the available width equally between them. You may also pick a subset of your columns to take up more or less space, while the remaining <Col>s equally split the rest, with specific column classes like <Col xs={7}>.
trans-unit.target: 如前面的示例所示，我们的网格系统允许您在 <Row> 或 <Form.Row> 中放置任意数量的 <Col> >。他们将在它们之间平均分配可用宽度。您还可以选择列的子集来占用更多或更少的空间，而其余的 <Col> 用相同的列类（如 <Col xs={7}> )平均分配其余部分。

trans-unit.source: Assistive technologies such as screen readers will have trouble with your forms if you don’t include a label for every input. For these inline forms, you can hide the labels using the srOnly prop. There are further alternative methods of providing a label for assistive technologies, such as the aria-label, aria-labelledby or title attribute. If none of these are present, assistive technologies may resort to using the placeholder attribute, if present, but note that use of placeholder as a replacement for other labelling methods is not advised.
trans-unit.target: 如果您没有为每个输入都添加标签，那么诸如屏幕阅读器之类的辅助技术将给您的表格带来麻烦。对于这些内联表单，您可以使用 srOnly 属性隐藏标签。还有其他替代方法可以为辅助技术提供标签，例如 aria-label ， aria-labelledby 或 title 属性。如果不存在任何一种，辅助技术可能会诉诸使用 placeholder 属性（如果存在），但是请注意，不建议使用 placeholder 代替其他标记方法。

trans-unit.source: Because the media object has so few structural requirements, you can also use these classes on list HTML elements. On your ul or ol , add the .list-unstyled to remove any browser default list styles, use <Media as="li"> to render as a list item. As always, use spacing utilities wherever needed to fine tune.
trans-unit.target: 由于媒体对象的结构要求很少，因此您也可以在列表HTML元素上使用这些类。在您的 ul 或 ol 上，添加.list-unstyled以删除任何浏览器默认列表样式，并使用 <Media as="li"> 呈现为列表项。与往常一样，在需要微调的地方使用间距实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap at its core
trans-unit.target: 核心的Bootstrap

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap includes a few general use CSS transitions that can be applied to a number of components. React Bootstrap, bundles them up into a few composable <Transition> components from react-transition-group, a commonly used animation wrapper for React.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap包含一些可以应用于许多组件的通用CSS过渡。React Bootstrap将它们捆绑到react-transition-group中的几个可组合的 <Transition> 组件中，react-transition-group是React常用的动画包装器。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap offers two animation styles for spinners. The animation style can be configured with the animation property. An animation style must always be provided when creating a spinner.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap为微调程序提供了两种动画样式。可以使用 animation 属性配置动画样式。创建微调器时，必须始终提供动画样式。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap only supports one modal window at a time. Nested modals aren’t supported, but if you really need them the underlying react-overlays can support them if you're willing.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap一次仅支持一个模式窗口。不支持嵌套模态，但是如果您确实需要它们，则底层的 react-overlays 可以在您愿意的情况下为它们提供支持。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap scopes the :valid and :invalid styles to parent .was-validated class, usually applied to the <Form> (you can use the validated prop as a shortcut). Otherwise, any required field without a value shows up as invalid on page load. This way, you may choose when to activate them (typically after form submission is attempted).
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap将 :valid 和 :invalid 样式的作用域 .was-validated 于父.was-validated类，通常应用于 <Form> （您可以使用已 validated prop作为快捷方式）。否则，任何没有值的必填字段在页面加载时都将显示为无效。这样，您可以选择何时激活它们（通常在尝试提交表单之后）。

trans-unit.source: By default, a dropdown menu is aligned to the left, but you can switch it by passing right to the align prop on a <DropdownMenu> or passing right to the menuAlign prop on the <DropdownButton> or <SplitButton> as seen below.

trans-unit.source: By default, any number of checkboxes and radios that are immediate sibling will be vertically stacked and appropriately spaced with FormCheck.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,任何数量的复选框和收音机是直接的兄弟姐妹,将垂直堆叠,并适当地与FormCheck间隔。

trans-unit.source: By default, browsers will treat all native form controls (<input>, <select> and <button> elements) inside a <fieldset disabled> as disabled, preventing both keyboard and mouse interactions on them. However, if your form also includes <a ... class="btn btn-*"> elements, these will only be given a style of pointer-events: none. As noted in the section about disabled state for buttons (and specifically in the sub-section for anchor elements), this CSS property is not yet standardized and isn’t fully supported in Internet Explorer 10, and won’t prevent keyboard users from being able to focus or activate these links. So to be safe, use custom JavaScript to disable such links.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，浏览器会将 <fieldset disabled> 内的所有本机表单控件（ <input> ， <select> 和 <button> 元素）都视为禁用，从而防止键盘和鼠标交互。但是，如果您的表单还包含 <a ... class="btn btn-*"> 元素，则这些元素将仅具有 pointer-events: none 样式：none。如有关按钮的禁用状态部分中所述（特别是在锚元素的小节中），此CSS属性尚未标准化，并且Internet Explorer 10中未完全支持此属性，并且不会阻止键盘用户聚焦或激活这些链接。为了安全起见，请使用自定义JavaScript禁用此类链接。

trans-unit.source: By provided children to the FormCheck you can forgo the default rendering and handle it yourself. (You can still provide an id to the FormCheck or FormGroup and have it propagate to the label and input).
trans-unit.target: 通过为 FormCheck 提供 children ，您可以放弃默认渲染并亲自处理。（您仍然可以向 FormCheck 或 FormGroup 提供一个 id ，并将其传播到标签和输入中）。

trans-unit.source: By providing children to the FormFile you can forgo the default rendering and handle it yourself. (You can still provide an id to the FormFile and have it propagate to the label and input).
trans-unit.target: 通过提供 children 的 FormFile 可以放弃默认渲染和自己处理。（您仍然可以为 FormFile 提供一个 id ，并将其传播到标签和输入中）。

trans-unit.source: By relying entirely on the Bootstrap stylesheet, React-Bootstrap just works with the thousands of Bootstrap themes you already love.
trans-unit.target: 通过完全依赖Bootstrap样式表,React-Bootstrap可以与你已经喜爱的数千种Bootstrap主题一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and more. Like overlays, Dropdowns are built using a third-party library Popper.js, which provides dynamic positioning and viewport detection.

trans-unit.source: Duration of the fade animation in milliseconds, to ensure that finishing callbacks are fired even if the original browser transition end events are canceled

trans-unit.source: Dynamic tabbed interfaces
trans-unit.target: 动态标签式界面

trans-unit.source: Dynamic tabbed interfaces should not contain dropdown menus, as this causes both usability and accessibility issues. From a usability perspective, the fact that the currently displayed tab’s trigger element is not immediately visible (as it’s inside the closed dropdown menu) can cause confusion. From an accessibility point of view, there is currently no sensible way to map this sort of construct to a standard WAI ARIA pattern, meaning that it cannot be easily made understandable to users of assistive technologies.
trans-unit.target: 动态选项卡式界面不应包含下拉菜单，因为这会导致可用性和可访问性问题。从可用性的角度来看，当前显示的选项卡的触发元素不是立即可见的（因为它位于关闭的下拉菜单中），这可能会引起混淆。从可访问性的角度来看，当前没有明智的方法将这种构造映射到标准WAI ARIA模式，这意味着辅助技术的用户无法轻易理解它。

trans-unit.source: Each component is implemented with accessibility in mind. The result is a set of accessible-by-default components, over what is possible from plain Bootstrap.
trans-unit.target: 每个组件的实现都考虑到了可访问性。其结果是一套默认的可访问组件,超过了普通Bootstrap的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Each of the Card components in the Accordion can have their entire header clickable, by setting the AccordionToggle's underlying component to be a CardHeader component.
trans-unit.target: 通过将AccordionToggle的底层组件设置为CardHeader组件,Accordion中的每一个Card组件都可以使其整个头部都可以点击。

trans-unit.source: Elements with the disabled attribute aren’t interactive, meaning users cannot hover or click them to trigger a popover (or tooltip). As a workaround, you’ll want to trigger the overlay from a wrapper <div> or <span> and override the pointer-events on the disabled element.
trans-unit.target: 具有 disabled 属性的元素不是交互式的，这意味着用户无法将鼠标悬停或单击它们以触发弹出窗口（或工具提示）。解决方法是，您要从包装 <div> 或 <span> 触发覆盖，并覆盖禁用元素上的 pointer-events 。

trans-unit.source: Enable a hover state on table rows within a <tbody>.
trans-unit.target: 在 <tbody> 内的表行上启用悬停状态。

trans-unit.source: Enables animation on the Carousel as it transitions between slides.
trans-unit.target: 启用旋转木马上的动画,因为它在幻灯片之间转换。

trans-unit.source: Encapsulating animations into components has the added benefit of making them more broadly useful, as well as portable for using in other libraries. All React-bootstrap components that can be animated, support pluggable <Transition> components.
trans-unit.target: 将动画封装到组件中具有额外的好处，即使它们更广泛地有用，并且可移植以在其他库中使用。所有可以动画化的React-bootstrap组件都支持可插入的 <Transition> 组件。

trans-unit.source: Entire Header Clickable
trans-unit.target: 整个页眉可点击

trans-unit.source: For a lighter touch, Buttons also come in outline-* variants with no background color.
trans-unit.target: 为了更轻松地触摸，按钮还具有没有背景色的 outline-* 变体。

trans-unit.source: For a nicer experience with checked state management use the <ToggleButtonGroup> instead of a <ButtonGroup toggle> component. The group behaves as a form component, where the value is an array of the selected values for a named checkbox group or the single toggled value in a similarly named radio group.
trans-unit.target: 为了获得更好的检查状态管理体验，请使用 <ToggleButtonGroup> 而不是 <ButtonGroup toggle> 组件。该组充当表单组件，其中 value 是命名复选框组或相似命名的单选组中的单个切换 value 的选定 value s的数组。

trans-unit.source: For basic closing behavior after all <Nav> descendant onSelect events in mobile viewports, try using collapseOnSelect.
trans-unit.target: 对于移动视口中所有 <Nav> 后代onSelect事件之后的基本关闭行为，请尝试使用crashOnSelect。

trans-unit.source: For building more complex pagination UI, there are few convenient sub-components for adding "First", "Previous", "Next", and "Last" buttons, as well as an Ellipsis item for indicating previous or continuing results.
trans-unit.target: 为了构建更复杂的分页UI，很少有方便的子组件来添加“第一”，“上一个”，“下一个”和“最后”按钮，以及一个 Ellipsis 项目以指示之前或之后的结果。

trans-unit.source: For even more customization and cross browser consistency, use our completely custom form elements to replace the browser defaults. They’re built on top of semantic and accessible markup, so they’re solid replacements for any default form control.
trans-unit.target: 为了获得更多的自定义和跨浏览器的一致性，请使用我们完全自定义的表单元素来替换浏览器的默认值。它们建立在语义和可访问标记之上，因此它们是任何默认表单控件的可靠替代品。

trans-unit.source: For file inputs, use Form.File.
trans-unit.target: 对于文件输入，请使用 Form.File 。

trans-unit.source: For links, use the <Alert.Link> component to provide matching colored links within any alert.
trans-unit.target: 对于链接，使用 <Alert.Link> 组件在任何警报中提供匹配的彩色链接。

trans-unit.source: For more advanced behaviors <OverlayTrigger> accepts a function child that passes in the injected ref and event handlers that correspond to the configured trigger prop.
trans-unit.target: 对于更高级的行为， <OverlayTrigger> 接受一个函数子级，该子级传入已注入的 ref 和与已配置的 trigger prop对应的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more complex layouts the flexible TabContainer, TabContent, and TabPane components along with any style of Nav allow you to quickly piece together your own Tabs component with additional markup needed.
trans-unit.target: 对于更复杂的布局，灵活的 TabContainer ， TabContent 和 TabPane 组件以及任何样式的 Nav 允许您快速将自己的Tabs组件拼凑在一起，并需要附加的标记。

trans-unit.source: For native HTML form validation–available in all our supported browsers, the :valid and :invalid pseudo selectors are used to apply validation styles as well as display feedback messages.
trans-unit.target: 对于本机HTML表单验证–在所有受支持的浏览器中均可用， :valid 和 :invalid 伪选择器用于应用验证样式以及显示反馈消息。

trans-unit.source: For offsetting grid columns you can set an offset value or for a more general layout, use the margin class utilities.
trans-unit.target: 对于偏移网格列，您可以设置 offset 值，或者对于更常规的布局，请使用边距类实用程序。

trans-unit.source: For systems that generate more notifications, consider using a wrapping element so they can easily stack.
trans-unit.target: 对于产生更多通知的系统,可以考虑使用包装元素,这样就可以轻松堆叠。

trans-unit.source: For textual form controls—like inputs, selects, and textareas—use the FormControl component. FormControl adds some additional styles for general appearance, focus state, sizing, and more.
trans-unit.target: 对于文本表单控件（例如 input s， select s和 textarea s），请使用 FormControl 组件。FormControl为常规外观，焦点状态，大小调整等添加了一些其他样式。

trans-unit.source: For the range form control you can pass the custom prop to get custom styling of the select element. The track (the background) and thumb (the value) are both styled to appear the same across browsers. As only IE and Firefox support “filling” their track from the left or right of the thumb as a means to visually indicate progress, we do not currently support it.
trans-unit.target: 对于 range 表单控件，您可以传递 custom 属性以获取select元素的自定义样式。轨道（背景）和拇指（值）的样式均在浏览器中显示为相同。由于只有IE和Firefox支持从拇指的左侧或右侧“填充”其轨迹，以可视方式指示进度，因此我们目前不支持。

trans-unit.source: For the select form control you can pass the custom prop to get custom styling of the select element. Custom styles are limited to the select initial appearance and cannot modify the option styling due to browser limitations.
trans-unit.target: 对于 select 表单控件，您可以传递 custom 属性以获取select元素的自定义样式。自定义样式仅限于 select 初始外观，并且由于浏览器的限制而无法修改 option 样式。

trans-unit.source: For the non-textual checkbox and radio controls, FormCheck provides a single component for both types that adds some additional styling and improved layout.
trans-unit.target: 对于非文本复选框和单选控件， FormCheck 为这两种类型都提供了单个组件，从而增加了一些其他样式并改善了布局。

trans-unit.source: For this, the Overlay component also injects a a popper prop with a scheduleUpdate() method that an overlay component can use to reposition itself.
trans-unit.target: 为此，Overlay组件还使用 scheduleUpdate() 方法注入 popper 属性，叠加组件可以使用该方法来重新定位自身。

trans-unit.source: For those that want to customize everything, you can forgo the included Toggle and Menu components, and create your own. By providing custom components to the as prop, you can control how each component behaves. Custom toggle and menu components must be able to accept refs.
trans-unit.target: 对于那些想要自定义所有内容的用户，可以放弃随附的Toggle和Menu组件，并创建自己的组件。通过为 as 属性提供自定义组件，您可以控制每个组件的行为。自定义切换和菜单组件必须能够接受引用。

trans-unit.source: Force the contents of your nav to extend the full available width. To proportionately fill the space use fill. Notice that the nav is the entire width but each nav item is a different size.
trans-unit.target: 强制导航的内容扩展整个可用宽度。要按比例填充空间，请使用 fill 。请注意，导航栏是整个宽度，但是每个导航栏项都是不同的大小。

trans-unit.source: Generally, if you stick to the Bootstrap defined classes and variants, there isn't anything you need to do to use a custom theme with React-Bootstrap. It just works. But we also make coloring outside the lines easy to do.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,如果你坚持使用Bootstrap定义的类和变体,你不需要做任何事情来使用React-Bootstrap的自定义主题。它就能正常工作。但我们也让线外的着色变得简单。

trans-unit.source: Help text below inputs can be styled with <Form.Text>. This component includes display: block and adds some top margin for easy spacing from the inputs above.
trans-unit.target: 输入下方的帮助文本可以使用 <Form.Text> 设置样式。该组件包括 display: block 并添加一些顶边距，以便与上面的输入轻松隔开。

trans-unit.source: Help text should be explicitly associated with the form control it relates to using the aria-describedby attribute. This will ensure that assistive technologies—such as screen readers—will announce this help text when the user focuses or enters the control.
trans-unit.target: 应该使用 aria-describedby 属性将帮助文本明确地与它所涉及的表单控件相关联。这将确保辅助技术（例如屏幕阅读器）在用户聚焦或进入控件时会宣布此帮助文本。

trans-unit.source: Here’s what you need to know before getting started with the Navbar:
trans-unit.target: 在开始使用Navbar之前，您需要了解以下内容：

trans-unit.source: Hide's the label visually.
trans-unit.target: 将标签隐藏在视觉上。

trans-unit.source: Hides the label visually while still allowing it to be read by assistive technologies.
trans-unit.target: 将标签隐藏起来,同时允许辅助技术读取。

trans-unit.source: Highlight the menu item as active.
trans-unit.target: 突出显示菜单项为活动状态。

trans-unit.source: Historically dropdown menu contents had to be links, but that’s no longer the case with v4. Now you can optionally use <button> elements in your dropdowns instead of just <a>s.
trans-unit.target: 过去，下拉菜单的内容必须是链接，但v4不再是这种情况。现在，您可以选择在下拉菜单中使用 <button> 元素，而不仅仅是 <a> 。

trans-unit.source: Horizontal
trans-unit.target: Horizontal

trans-unit.target: 水平形式

trans-unit.source: Horizontal form label sizing
trans-unit.target: 水平表格标签尺寸

trans-unit.source: Hover over the links below to see tooltips.
trans-unit.target: 将鼠标移到下面的链接上可以看到工具提示。

trans-unit.source: How and which Bootstrap styles you include is up to you, but the simplest way is to include the latest styles from the CDN. A little more information about the benefits of using a CDN can be found here.
trans-unit.target: 取决于如何以及如何包括Bootstrap样式，但是最简单的方法是包括CDN中的最新样式。有关使用CDN的好处的更多信息，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: If not using the custom prop FormFile.Label> should be before <FormFile.Input isInvalid />
trans-unit.target: 如果未使用自定义道具 FormFile.Label> ,则应在 <FormFile.Input isInvalid /> 之前

trans-unit.source: If providing a custom, non DOM, component. the show, close and alignRight props are also injected and should be handled appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供自定义的非DOM组件。该 show ， close 和 alignRight 道具也被注入，并应妥善处理。

trans-unit.source: If set to "hover", pauses the cycling of the carousel on mouseenter and resumes the cycling of the carousel on mouseleave. If set to false, hovering over the carousel won't pause it.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 "hover" ，则暂停在 mouseenter 上的轮播循环，并在 mouseleave 上恢复轮播的循环。如果设置为 false ，则将鼠标悬停在转盘上不会暂停它。

trans-unit.source: If the default handling of the dropdown menu and toggle components aren't to your liking, you can customize them, by using the more basic <Dropdown> Component to explicitly specify the Toggle and Menu components
trans-unit.target: 如果您不喜欢下拉菜单和切换组件的默认处理方式，则可以使用更基本的 <Dropdown> 组件来显式指定“切换”和“菜单”组件，从而自定义它们。

trans-unit.source: If using the custom prop <FormFile.Input isInvalid /> should be before FormFile.Label>
trans-unit.target: 如果使用自定义道具 <FormFile.Input isInvalid /> 应该在 FormFile.Label> 之前

trans-unit.source: If you are not setting the custom prop thelabel should be before the input.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未设置 custom 道具，则 label 应在 input 之前。

trans-unit.source: If you are setting the custom prop the input element has to be placed before the label or the buttonText prop will not work.
trans-unit.target: 如果要设置自定义道具，则必须将 input 元素放置在 label 或 buttonText 道具不起作用之前。

trans-unit.source: If you plan on customizing the Bootstrap Sass files, or don't want to use a CDN for the stylesheet, it may be helpful to install vanilla Bootstrap as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果您打算自定义Bootstrap Sass文件，或者不想在样式表中使用CDN，那么安装香草Bootstrap也可能会有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: If you want each NavItem to be the same size use justify.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望每个NavItem具有相同的大小，请使用 justify 。

trans-unit.source: If you want to have readonly elements in your form styled as plain text, use the plaintext prop on FormControls to remove the default form field styling and preserve the correct margin and padding.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想在你的表单样式为纯文本只读元素，请使用 plaintext 上FormControls道具删除默认的表单域的造型和保留正确的margin和padding。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use responsive menu alignment, pass an object to the align prop on the <DropdownMenu> or the menuAlign prop on the <DropdownButton> and <SplitButton>. You can specify the directions left or right for the various breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要使用自适应菜单排列，传递对象的 align 在支架 <DropdownMenu> 或 menuAlign 在支架 <DropdownButton> 和 <SplitButton> 。您可以为各个断点指定 left 或 right 的方向。

trans-unit.source: If you want your Accordion to start in a fully-collapsed state, then simply don't pass in a defaultActiveKey prop to Accordion.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望手风琴以完全折叠的状态启动，则只需不将 defaultActiveKey 属性传递给 Accordion 。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to customize the Bootstrap theme or any Bootstrap variables you can create a custom Sass file:
trans-unit.target: 如果你想定制Bootstrap主题或任何Bootstrap变量,你可以创建一个自定义的Sass文件。

trans-unit.source: If you would like to add a custom theme on your app using Create React App, they have additional documentation for Create React App and Bootstrap here
trans-unit.target: 如果您想使用Create React App在您的应用程序上添加自定义主题，请点击此处，了解有关Create React App和Bootstrap的其他文档。

trans-unit.source: If you're noticing choppy animations, and the component that's being collapsed has non-zero margin or padding, try wrapping the contents of your <Collapse> inside a node with no margin or padding, like the <div> in the example below. This will allow the height to be computed properly, so the animation can proceed smoothly.
trans-unit.target: 如果注意到不稳定的动画，并且要折叠的组件的边距或填充非零，请尝试将 <Collapse> 的内容包装在没有边距或填充的节点内，例如下面的示例中的 <div> 。这样可以正确计算高度，因此动画可以顺利进行。

trans-unit.source: If your application contains a large number of form groups, we recommend building a higher-level component encapsulating a complete field group that renders the label, the control, and any other necessary components. We don't provide this out-of-the-box, because the composition of those field groups is too specific to an individual application to admit a good one-size-fits-all solution.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的应用程序包含大量的表单组,我们建议构建一个更高级别的组件,封装一个完整的字段组,以渲染标签、控件和任何其他必要的组件。我们不提供这种开箱即用的功能,因为这些字段组的组成对于一个单独的应用程序来说太特殊了,不可能有一个好的一刀切的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: If your form layout allows it, you can use the tooltip prop to display validation feedback in a styled tooltip. Be sure to have a parent with position: relative on it for tooltip positioning. In the example below, our column classes have this already, but your project may require an alternative setup.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的表单布局允许，则可以使用 tooltip 道具以样式化的工具提示显示验证反馈。确保工具上有一个 position: relative 为父的位置：相对位置。在下面的示例中，我们的列类已经具有此功能，但是您的项目可能需要替代设置。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the standard size, a smaller additional preconfigured size is available by configuring the size property to sm.

trans-unit.source: In case you are using Sass the simplest way is to include the Bootstrap’s source Sass files in your main Sass file and then require it on your src/index.js or App.js file. trans-unit.source: Methods and events using jQuery is done imperatively by directly manipulating the DOM. In contrast, React uses updates to the state to update the virtual DOM. In this way, React-Bootstrap provides a more reliable solution by incorporating Bootstrap functionality into React's virtual DOM. Below are a few examples of how React-Bootstrap components differ from Bootstrap.
trans-unit.target: 使用jQuery的方法和事件是必须通过直接操作DOM来完成的。而React则是通过对状态的更新来更新虚拟DOM。这样一来,React-Bootstrap通过将Bootstrap功能融入到React的虚拟DOM中,提供了更可靠的解决方案。以下是React-Bootstrap组件与Bootstrap不同的几个例子。

trans-unit.source: Note that Row column widths will override Col widths set on lower breakpoints when viewed on larger screens. The <Col xs={6} /> size will be overriden by <Row md={4} /> on medium and larger screens.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是 Row 的列宽将覆盖 Col 在更大屏幕上观察时低断点宽度集。所述 <Col xs={6} /> 的大小将被覆盖由 <Row md={4} /> 上介质和更大的屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Note that depending on how they are used, badges may be confusing for users of screen readers and similar assistive technologies. While the styling of badges provides a visual cue as to their purpose, these users will simply be presented with the content of the badge. Depending on the specific situation, these badges may seem like random additional words or numbers at the end of a sentence, link, or button. Unless the context is clear, consider including additional context with a visually hidden piece of additional text.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,根据徽章的使用方式,徽章可能会让屏幕阅读器和类似辅助技术的用户感到困惑。虽然徽章的样式提供了关于其目的的视觉提示,但这些用户只会看到徽章的内容。根据具体的情况,这些徽章可能看起来像句子、链接或按钮末尾的随机附加单词或数字。除非上下文很清楚,否则可以考虑用一段视觉上隐藏的附加文字来包含额外的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Note that the data-browse attribute does not to anything unless the custom prop is set.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，除非设置了 custom 属性，否则 data-browse 属性不会有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: React Bootstrap is maintained by a team of developers on Github. We have a growing team and if you are interested in re-building the most popular front-end framework with React we would love to hear from you.
trans-unit.target: React Bootstrap由Github上的一组开发人员维护。我们的团队在不断壮大，如果您有兴趣使用React重新构建最受欢迎的前端框架，我们将很高兴收到您的来信。

trans-unit.source: React Bootstrap v1 adds full compatibility with Bootstrap 4. Because bootstrap 4 is a major rewrite of the project there are significant breaking changes from the pre v1 react-bootstrap.
trans-unit.target: React Bootstrap v1增加了与Bootstrap 4的完全兼容性。由于bootstrap 4是项目的主要重写，因此与pre v1 react-bootstrap相比，存在重大的重大变化。

trans-unit.source: React Bootstrap will prevent any onClick handlers from firing regardless of the rendered element.
trans-unit.target: 无论所呈现的元素如何，React Bootstrap都会阻止任何 onClick 处理程序触发。

trans-unit.source: React-Bootstrap

trans-unit.source: React-Bootstrap only contains components that are present in vanilla Bootstrap. If functionality was removed from Bootstrap, then it was also removed from React-Bootstrap. This guide does not repeat information found in the upstream migration guide. Its goal is to document React-Bootstrap-specific API changes and additions.
trans-unit.target: React-Bootstrap仅包含香草Bootstrap中存在的组件。如果功能已从Bootstrap中删除，那么它也已从React-Bootstrap中删除。本指南不再重复上游迁移指南中的信息。其目标是记录特定于React-Bootstrap的API更改和添加。

trans-unit.source: React-Bootstrap has started a repo with a few basic CodeSandbox examples. Click here to check them out.
trans-unit.target: React-Bootstrap已开始使用一些基本的CodeSandbox示例进行回购。单击此处签出。

trans-unit.source: React-Bootstrap is a complete re-implementation of the Bootstrap components using React. It has no dependency on either bootstrap.js or jQuery. If you have React setup and React-Bootstrap installed, you have everything you need.
trans-unit.target: React-Bootstrap是使用React完全重新实现Bootstrap组件。它不依赖 bootstrap.js 或jQuery。如果您已经安装了React安装程序并安装了React-Bootstrap，那么您将拥有所需的一切。

trans-unit.source: React-Bootstrap is compatible with existing Bootstrap themes. Just follow the installation instructions for your theme of choice.
trans-unit.target: React-Bootstrap与现有的Bootstrap主题兼容。只需按照您选择的主题的安装说明进行安装即可。

trans-unit.source: React-Bootstrap replaces the Bootstrap JavaScript. Each component has been built from scratch as a true React component, without unneeded dependencies like jQuery.
trans-unit.target: React-Bootstrap取代了Bootstrap JavaScript。每个组件都是作为一个真正的React组件从头开始构建的,没有像jQuery这样不需要的依赖。

trans-unit.source: Responsive tables allow tables to be scrolled horizontally with ease. Across every breakpoint, use responsive for horizontally scrolling tables. Responsive tables are wrapped automatically in a div. Use responsive="sm", responsive="md", responsive="lg", or responsive="xl" as needed to create responsive tables up to a particular breakpoint. From that breakpoint and up, the table will behave normally and not scroll horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 响应式表允许轻松地水平滚动表。在每个断点处，将 responsive 用于水平滚动表。响应表自动包装在 div 中。根据需要使用 responsive="sm" ， responsive="md" ， responsive="lg" 或 responsive="xl" 来创建直到特定断点的响应表。从该断点开始，该表将正常运行并且不会水平滚动。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, You create a split dropdown by combining the Dropdown components with another Button and a ButtonGroup.
trans-unit.target: 类似地,您可以通过将Dropdown组件与另一个Button和ButtonGroup相结合来创建一个分离式下拉菜单。

trans-unit.source: Since React-Bootstrap is built with React Javascript, state can be passed within React-Bootstrap components as a prop. It also makes it easier to manage the state as updates are made using React’s state instead of directly manipulating the state of the DOM. This also gives a lot of flexibility when creating more complex components.
trans-unit.target: 由于React-Bootstrap是使用React Javascript构建的，因此状态可以作为支持在React-Bootstrap组件内传递。当使用React的状态进行更新而不是直接操纵DOM的状态时，这也使管理状态变得更加容易。在创建更复杂的组件时，这也提供了很大的灵活性。

trans-unit.source: Since the above is such a common configuration react-bootstrap provides the <DropdownButton> component to help reduce typing. Provide a title prop and some <DropdownItem>s and you're ready to go.
trans-unit.target: 由于上面是这样的常用配置，因此react-bootstrap提供了 <DropdownButton> 组件来帮助减少键入。提供 title 道具和一些 <DropdownItem> ，您就可以开始了。

trans-unit.source: Since the above pattern is pretty common, but verbose, we've included <OverlayTrigger> component to help with common use-cases. It even has functionality to delayed show or hides, and a few different "trigger" events you can mix and match.
trans-unit.target: 由于上述模式很常见，但很冗长，因此我们包含了 <OverlayTrigger> 组件，以帮助解决常见的用例。它甚至具有延迟显示或隐藏的功能，以及一些您可以混合和匹配的不同“触发”事件。

trans-unit.source: Since these positioning needs are so common for Navbars, we've added convenience props for them
trans-unit.target: 由于这些定位需求对于Navbars来说非常普遍,所以我们为它们添加了方便的道具。

trans-unit.source: Since we can't know every time your overlay changes size, to reposition it, you need to take manual action if you want to update the position of an Overlay in response to a change.
trans-unit.target: 由于我们不可能每次都知道你的Overlay的大小变化,所以要重新定位,如果你想根据变化更新Overlay的位置,就需要手动操作。

trans-unit.source: That said, it Dropdowns do work technically (sans focus management), but we don't make any claims about support.

trans-unit.source: The WAI ARIA standard defines a role="menu" widget, but it's very specific to a certain kind of menu.
trans-unit.target: 该WAI ARIA标准定义了一个 role="menu" 窗口小部件，但它是非常具体的某一种菜单。

trans-unit.source: The <FormControl> component directly renders the <input> or other specified component. If you need to access the value of an uncontrolled <FormControl>, attach a ref to it as you would with an uncontrolled input, then call ReactDOM.findDOMNode(ref) to get the DOM node. You can then interact with that node as you would with any other uncontrolled input.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <FormControl> 组件直接呈现 <input> 或其他指定的组件。如果您需要访问不受控制的 <FormControl> 的值，请像使用不受控制的输入一样将 ref 附加到该值，然后调用 ReactDOM.findDOMNode(ref) 来获取DOM节点。然后，您可以与该节点进行交互，就像与其他任何不受控制的输入一样。

trans-unit.source: The <FormControl> component renders a form control with Bootstrap styling. The <FormGroup> component wraps a form control with proper spacing, along with support for a label, help text, and validation state. To ensure accessibility, set controlId on <FormGroup>, and use <FormLabel> for the label.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <FormControl> 组件呈现与引导造型表单控件。所述 <FormGroup> 组件包装了适当的间隔一个形式控制，具有用于标签支撑，帮助文本，和验证状态一起。为了确保可访问性，请在 <FormGroup> 上设置 controlId ，并将 <FormLabel> 用作标签。

trans-unit.source: The <Tooltip> and <Popover> components do not position themselves. Instead the <Overlay> (or <OverlayTrigger>) components, inject ref and style props.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <Tooltip> 和 <Popover> 组件不自己定位。取而代之的是 <Overlay> （或 <OverlayTrigger> ）组件，注入 ref 和 style 道具。

trans-unit.source: The <input> element type
trans-unit.target: 所述 <input> 元素 type

trans-unit.source: The Col breakpoint props also have a more complicated object prop form: {span: number, order: number, offset: number} for specifying offsets and ordering effects.
trans-unit.target: 的 Col 断点道具也具有更复杂的 object 丙形式： {span: number, order: number, offset: number} 用于指定偏移和订购的效果。

trans-unit.source: The Col lets you specify column widths across 5 breakpoint sizes (xs, sm, md, lg, and xl). For every breakpoint, you can specify the amount of columns to span, or set the prop to <Col lg={true} /> for auto layout widths.
trans-unit.target: 通过 Col ，您可以指定跨5个断点大小（xs，sm，md，lg和xl）的列宽。对于每个断点，您可以指定要跨越的列数，或将prop设置为 <Col lg={true} /> 以获取自动布局宽度。

trans-unit.source: The FormGroup component is the easiest way to add some structure to forms. It provides a flexible container for grouping of labels, controls, optional help text, and form validation messaging. By default it only applies margin-bottom, but it picks up additional styles in <Form inline > as needed. Use it with fieldsets, divs, or nearly any other element.
trans-unit.target: 该 FormGroup 组成部分，是一些结构添加到形式最简单的方法。它为标签，控件，可选的帮助文本和表单验证消息的分组提供了灵活的容器。默认情况下，它仅适用于下边距，但会根据需要在 <Form inline > 选取其他样式。与 fieldset ， div 或几乎任何其他元素一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The Row lets you specify column widths across 5 breakpoint sizes (xs, sm, md, lg, and xl). For every breakpoint, you can specify the amount of columns that will fit next to each other.
trans-unit.target: 通过“ Row ，您可以跨5个断点大小（xs，sm，md，lg和xl）指定列宽。对于每个断点，您可以指定彼此相邻的列数。

trans-unit.source: The eventKey of the currently active tab.
trans-unit.target: 当前活动选项卡的 eventKey 。

trans-unit.source: The order property also supports first (order: -1) and last (order: $columns+1).
trans-unit.target: 该 order 属性还支持 first （ order: -1 ）和 last （ order: $columns+1 ）。

trans-unit.source: The type argument will either be "tab" or "pane".
trans-unit.target: 所述 type 参数要么是 "tab" 或 "pane" 。

trans-unit.source: The value attribute of underlying input
trans-unit.target: 基础输入的 value 属性

trans-unit.source: The ARIA role describing the button toolbar. Generally the default "toolbar" role is correct. An aria-label or aria-labelledby prop is also recommended.
trans-unit.target: 描述按钮工具栏的ARIA角色。通常，默认的“工具栏”角色是正确的。还建议使用 aria-label 或prop标签标记的 aria-labelledby 。

trans-unit.source: The ARIA role for the NavLink, In the context of a 'tablist' parent Nav, the role defaults to 'tab'
trans-unit.target: NavLink 的ARIA角色，在“ tablist”父Nav的上下文中，该角色默认为“ tab”

trans-unit.source: The ARIA role for the navbar, will default to 'navigation' for Navbars whose as is something other than <nav>.
trans-unit.target: 在导航栏的ARIA角色，将默认为导航栏，其“导航” as 比其他的东西 <nav> 。

trans-unit.source: The ARIA role of the component
trans-unit.target: ARIA组成部分的作用

trans-unit.source: The Alert visual variant
trans-unit.target: 警报视觉变体

trans-unit.source: The CSS and details of Bootstrap components are rather opinionated and lengthy. React-Bootstrap simplifies this by condensing the original Bootstrap into React-styled components.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap组件的CSS和细节相当有意见和冗长。React-Bootstrap通过将原Bootstrap浓缩成React风格的组件来简化这一问题。

trans-unit.source: The Default behavior is falseunless the Menu has a role="menu" where it will default to keyboard to match the recommended ARIA Authoring practices.
trans-unit.target: 除非菜单具有 role="menu" ，否则默认行为为 false ，在默认情况下，该菜单将默认为 keyboard 以匹配推荐的ARIA创作惯例。

trans-unit.source: The Form ref will be forwarded to the underlying element, which means, unless it's rendered as a composite component, it will be a DOM node, when resolved.
trans-unit.target: Form ref 将转发到基础元素，这意味着，除非将其 as 复合组件呈现，否则在解析时它将是DOM节点。

trans-unit.source: The FormCheck ref will be forwarded to the underlying input element, which means it will be a DOM node, when resolved.
trans-unit.target: FormCheck ref 将转发到基础输入元素，这意味着解析后它将是DOM节点。

trans-unit.source: The FormControl ref will be forwarded to the underlying input element, which means unless as is a composite component, it will be a DOM node, when resolved.
trans-unit.target: FormControl ref 将转发到基础输入元素，这意味着除非 as 复合组件，否则解析后它将是DOM节点。

trans-unit.source: The FormGroup ref will be forwarded to the underlying element. Unless the FormGroup is rendered as a composite component, it will be a DOM node, when resolved.
trans-unit.target: FormGroup ref 将转发到基础元素。除非将FormGroup呈现 as 复合组件，否则解析后它将是DOM节点。

trans-unit.source: The FormLabel ref will be forwarded to the underlying element. Unless the FormLabel is rendered as a composite component, it will be a DOM node, when resolved.
trans-unit.target: FormLabel ref 将转发到基础元素。除非将FormLabel渲染 as 复合组件，否则解析后它将是DOM节点。

trans-unit.source: The FormText ref will be forwarded to the underlying element. Unless the FormText is rendered as a composite component, it will be a DOM node, when resolved.
trans-unit.target: FormText ref 将转发到基础元素。除非将FormText呈现 as 复合组件，否则解析后它将是DOM节点。

trans-unit.source: The HTML for attribute for associating the label with an input
trans-unit.target: 用于将标签与输入关联起来的HTML属性。

trans-unit.source: The HTML href attribute for the NavLink
trans-unit.target: NavLink 的HTML href属性

trans-unit.source: The HTML input type, which is only relevant if as is 'input' (the default).
trans-unit.target: HTML输入 type ，仅当 as 为 'input' （默认值）时才相关。

trans-unit.source: The HTML input name, used to group like checkboxes or radio buttons together semantically
trans-unit.target: HTML输入名称,用于将复选框或单选按钮等按语义分组。

trans-unit.source: The Modal Header, Title, Body, and Footer components are available as static properties the <Modal/> component, but you can also, import them directly like: require("react-bootstrap/ModalHeader").
trans-unit.target: Modal Header，Title，Body和Footer组件可作为 <Modal/> 组件的静态属性使用，但您也可以直接将其导入，例如： require("react-bootstrap/ModalHeader") 。

trans-unit.source: The React component model gives us more control over form and function of each component.
trans-unit.target: React组件模型让我们对每个组件的形式和功能有更多的控制。

trans-unit.source: The above demonstrates how flexible the component model can be. But if you didn't want to roll your own versions we've included a straight-forward <NavDropdown> that works for most cases.
trans-unit.target: 上面展示了组件模型的灵活性。但是，如果您不想发布自己的版本，我们将提供一个简单 <NavDropdown> ，适用于大多数情况。

trans-unit.source: The above handles styling, But requires manually controlling the checked state for each radio or checkbox in the group.
trans-unit.target: 上面处理样式，但是需要手动控制组中每个单选框或复选框的 checked 状态。

trans-unit.source: The active state of the NavItem item.
trans-unit.target: NavItem项目的活动状态。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time to delay between automatically cycling an item. If null, carousel will not automatically cycle.
trans-unit.target: 自动循环项目之间的延迟时间。如果为 null ，则轮播不会自动循环。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time to delay between automatically cycling this specific item. Will default to the Carousel's interval prop value if none is specified.
trans-unit.target: 在自动循环此特定项目之间延迟的时间。如果未指定，则默认为轮播的 interval 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The aspect ratio is controlled via the aspectRatio prop.
trans-unit.target: 纵横比是通过 aspectRatio 属性控制的。

trans-unit.source: The basic Dropdown is composed of a wrapping Dropdown and inner <DropdownMenu>, and <DropdownToggle>. By default the <DropdownToggle> will render a Button component and accepts all the same props.
trans-unit.target: 基本的Dropdown由包装的 Dropdown 和内部 <DropdownMenu> 和 <DropdownToggle> 组成。默认情况下， <DropdownToggle> 将呈现一个 Button 组件并接受所有相同的道具。

trans-unit.source: The basic, variant-less, Nav component does not include any active prop styling!
trans-unit.target: 基本的，无变体的 Nav 组件不包含任何 active prop样式！

trans-unit.source: The best way to consume React-Bootstrap is via the npm package which you can install with npm (or yarn if you prefer).
trans-unit.target: 消耗React-Bootstrap的最好方法是通过npm软件包，您可以将其与 npm 一起安装（或者根据需要安装 yarn ）。
